spec_data.Name: libmlx5
spec_data.Description:
libmlx5 provides a device-specific user space driver for Mellanox
Connect-IB and ConnectX-4 HCAs for use with the libibverbs library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 10:42:42 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Mellanox Connect-IB and ConnectX-4 InfiniBand HCAs User Space Driver
